id: scenario-value-scanner-preteen-scenarios-family-preventing household stress from breaking family bonds
title: Preventing household stress from breaking family bonds
description: Preventing household stress from breaking family bonds
content:
Scenario: Preventing household stress from breaking family bonds
    Given Sarah is stretched thin across two jobs
    And Marcus carries substantial household responsibility
    When family stress levels are high
    Then the family_elohim should monitor for relationship strain
    And it should facilitate communication between Marcus and Sarah
    And it should prompt Sarah to recognize Marcus's work
    And it should connect family to support resources before crisis
    And the protocol should prevent stress from damaging their bond
    And care visibility should make burden manageable
    And support should flow to prevent family breakdown
